channel.title: StarCraft 2 information required
channel.description: Hey, I need to design(not make) a RTS game and I'm choosing StarCraft 2 as it is a well known game with a lot of information available about it. However, I'm not too familiar with RTS games as its not my type of thing. I need to know what programming languages are used in it, what software is required to make the game and what is required to run the game(easy enough to find though). I'd appreciate it if yous could tell me/point me in the right direction as it'd save me a lot of time. Thanks in advance.

item.title: StarCraft 2 information required
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:4, topic:442540”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=545227.msg3996898#msg3996898 date=1337396079]

google starcraft 2 wiki

Haha funny [quote]Rule 3:
Posts should be knowledgeable, try to put some effort into them, it’ll save hassle and stop you from looking like an idiot.[/quote]
Also, in my OP I said [quote]I’d appreciate it if yous could tell me/point me in the right direction as it’d save me a lot of time[/quote]

I am looking for a legit legal version of windows XP pro service pack two, I have my key with me but neglected to bring the disk, it needs to be a public torrent and not a crack, anyone have any links the only ones I found on Google for legit windows XP had been service pack 3

google starcraft 2 wiki windows xp pro service pack two torrent

[/quote]

In the quote you used she said she had already googled it, but didn’t find what she was looking for…[/quote]
Same situation, neither of us has googled the topics hard enough. I’ve already got a fair bit of information but it is from unreliable sources and I’d like to compare what I’ve got so she’s being a hipocrit if anything.

Thanks rodger

Read full topic
